thread.title: Family Feud Contestant Stuns Steve Harvey When He Answers 'Something That Has To Be Licked' (Video)
thread.title_full: Family Feud Contestant Stuns Steve Harvey When He Answers 'Something That Has To Be Licked' (Video)

author: Charles Roberts
title: Family Feud Contestant Stuns Steve Harvey When He Answers 'Something That Has To Be Licked' (Video)
text:
A video of  a recent Family Feud episode went viral  after one contestant responded with an answer to things that should be licked.
A lollipop and ice cream cone had already been picked, and despite the other available answers like a postage stamp, Gene hilariously delivered  his  unique answer as he stared straight-faced into the camera.
In response, the two women on the team responded with high-fives and words of encouragement.
Unfortunately, Gene’s answer didn’t appear on the board.
“Folks, I can’t tell you how many good answers don’t show up on that board,” host Steve Harvey said.
The video has accumulated  almost 400,000 views  since it was uploaded on Tuesday.

Sources:  Fox News ,  Decider  / Photo Credit: Fox News
